## List of reports published by PAB

* [Example AMAPPS report](/content/Reporting/AMAPPS/AMAPPS_2019.pdf): Every 5 years \
  + [AMAPPS Template](/content/Reporting/AMAPPS/AMAPPS_TEMPLATE.pdf)
* [Example Navy annual HARP report](/content/Reporting/NAVY/NAVY_Report.pdf): Annual
* [Example NARW report format](/content/Reporting/NARW/NARW.pdf): Every 6 months
* Navy screening report (no example yet)
* BOEM POWERON reports (no example yet): Annual
* [Example NOPP report](/content/Reporting/NOPP/NOPP_2013.pdf)

## State of the Ecosystem 
* [Cetacean Weekly Acoustic Presence in SNE](https://noaa-edab.github.io/tech-doc/cetacean_acoustic.html): A summary of weekly acoustic presence of eight cetacean species summarized across two years at four recording sites in southern New England.
* [Ambient Sound Levels in SNE Wind Energy Areas](https://noaa-edab.github.io/catalog/wea_sound.html): Annual decidecade sound pressure levels from Southern New England Wind Energy Areas
